Name: VENOMOUS LICH WAND OF THE MAGUS
Text: VENOMOUS LICH WAND OF THE MAGUS|ONE-HAND DAMAGE: 10 TO 31|DURABILITY: 17 OF 17|REQUIRED STRENGTH: 25|REQUIRED LEVEL: 56|STAFF CLASS - VERY FAST ATTACK SPEED|+3 TO POISON AND BONE SKILLS (NECROMANCER ONLY)|+20% FASTER CAST RATE|+3 TO BONE SPIRIT (NECROMANCER ONLY)|+3 TO BONE SPEAR (NECROMANCER ONLY)|+3 TO BONE WALL (NECROMANCER ONLY)|+50% DAMAGE TO UNDEAD|CTRL + LEFT CLICK TO DROP
